text: [Music]
I
um work in a lot of medium I work in
prints I take photographs I do little
sketches
I um do watercolors pastels small
painting
big
paintings and of
course most important I'm looking and
thinking when I started painting for
example I
draw with a carbon on the end of a stick
charcoal on the end of a stick then I
make the paint and it's in buckets and I
work wet into wet and hopefully I get it
in one session and if I don't I have a
uh the difficult task of waiting until I
can revisit the painting which sometimes
well no actually often happens then I go
back again and I keep doing it until
it's till it's
mine yeah I'm very
habitual I get up in the morning just
like everybody else and
then
I do something that I guess is called
getting ready
because my work is ex
extremely dependent on being ready
because it's as much a dance as it is
visual so I do my
correspondence I mess around I walk
around I play with the cat I make my
telephone calls I go in the studio I
nearly start work I leave the studio I
go back in the studio again then I try
to start work again maybe on something
small and then I'm kind of into it maybe
I stop for lunch and then I and then I'm
ready so
afternoon is Crescendo time
